title: Jerrod Carmichael and Lil Rel Howery Interview
itunes:title: Jerrod Carmichael and Lil Rel Howery Interview
description:
Wednesday 5/25- Today on the show we had comedians Lil Rel Howery and Jerrod Carmichael come through to promote the new season of the Carmichael Show and during that an interesting conversation about rape culture came up. Also Charlamagne gave Donkey of the Day to the founders of a restaurant and Angela helped some listeners out during for Ask Yee.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
